name: PRINTER HP OJ 8100 INKJET
short_description: A4; A5; A6 (10 x 15 cm); 13 x 18 cm; Envelope (C5, C6, DL); Letter | Custom: Tray 1: 76.2 x 127 to 215.9 x 355.6 mm (custom sizes supported by Mac driver only)
long_description:
Brand: HP
Part Number: CM752A
Memory: 128 MB DDR3
Print Speed: black (draft, A4) Up to 35 ppm; colour (draft, A4) Up to 35 ppm; (ISO, laser comparable) Up to 20 ppm; (ISO, laser comparable) Up to 16 ppm
Resolution: black (best) Up to 1200 x 600 dpi; color (best) Up to 4800 x 1200 optimised dpi on HP Advanced Photo paper, 1200 x 1200 input dpi
Input Capacity: 250-sheet input tray
Output Capacity: 150-sheet output tray
Media Size: A4; A5; A6 (10 x 15 cm); 13 x 18 cm; Envelope (C5, C6, DL); Letter | Custom: Tray 1: 76.2 x 127 to 215.9 x 355.6 mm (custom sizes supported by Mac driver only)
Media Type: Plain paper, Thick plain paper, HP Bright White Paper, HP Professional Inkjet Paper 120 Matte, HP Premium Plus Photo Papers*, Other inkjet papers, HP Advanced Photo Papers, HP Everyday Photo Paper, Glossy*, Other photo papers, Other specialty papers, Other Greeting Cards, HP Professional inkjet Paper 180, Glossy and Matte, Other brochure papers, Card Stock
LCD: Colour LCD (icon-based graphic display)
OS Compatibility: Microsoft® Windows® 7; Windows Vista®; Windows® XP (SP3) or higher (32-bit only); Mac OS X v10.5 or v10.6, Linux (For more information, see http://hplipopensource.com/hplip-web/index.html)

Size (WxDxH)mm: 494 x 458 x 202 mm (including duplexer)

name: HP Deskjet 1510 All-in-One
short_description: A4, 4800 x 1200 dpi, Black/White 20 ppm Print, Color 16 ppm Print, 1200 dpi Scan, Black/White 4 cpm Copy, Color 2 cpm Copy, Tray 1# 60, USB
long_description:
Supported Operating Systems :

Compatible operating systems : 

  • Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP SP3 or higher (32-bit only)
  • Mac OS X v10.6, Lion, Mountain Lion

 

Printer Specifications :

  • Functions : Print, copy, scan
  • Multitasking supported : No
  • Automatic paper sensor : No
  • Borderless printing : No
  • Direct print supported : None (not supported)
  • Duplex printing : Manual (driver support provided)
  • Duty cycle (monthly, A4) : Up to 1000 pages
  • Recommended monthly page volume : 50 to 200
  • Envelope feeder : No
  • Paper trays, maximum : 1
  • Paper trays, standard : 1
  • Print colours : Yes
  • Printer drivers included : HP PCL 3 GUI
  • Print languages : HP PCL 3 GUI
  • Vertical alignment accuracy : +/- 0.0050 mm
  • Print technology :  HP Thermal Inkjet
  • Photo proofsheets supported : No
  • SureSupply note :  HP SureSupply assists you when you want to replace a print cartridge and helps you shop and purchase locally or via the Internet. For more information, visit hp.com/learn/suresupply. Only available for genuine HP supplies. Internet access required.
  • SureSupply supported : Yes

 

Printing Media Handling :

  • Maximum input capacity (sheets) : Up to 60 sheets
  • Maximum input capacity (cards) : Up to 20 Cards
  • Envelope input capacity : Up to 5 envelopes
  • Maximum input capacity (10x15cm photos) : Up to 20 sheets
  • Input capacity : Up to 60 sheets
  • Finished output handling : Sheetfed
  • Maximum output capacity (photo paper) : Up to 20 sheets
  • Output capacity : Up to 25 sheets
  • Paper handling input, standard : 60-sheet input tray
  • Paper handling output, standard : 25-sheet output tray

 

Supported Printing Media :

  • Media sizes, custom : 
    • 89 x 127 to 215 x 279 mm
  • Media sizes supported :
    • A4 (210 x 297 mm)
    • A6 (105 x 148 mm) 
    • B5 (176 x 250 mm) 
    • DL envelope (110 x 220 mm) 
  • Media types :
    • Paper (brochure, inkjet, plain), photo paper, envelopes, labels, cards (greeting)
  • Media weight, supported :
    • Tray 1: A4: 60 to 90 g/m² 
    • HP envelopes: 75 to 90 g/m² 
    • HP cards: up to 200 g/m² 
    • HP 10 x 15 cm photo paper: up to 300 g/m² 
  • Media weight, recommended :
    • 75 g/m²

 

Print Area :

  • Bottom margin (A4): 14.5 mm
  • Left margin (A4) : 3.2 mm
  • Right margin (A4) : 3.2 mm
  • Top margin (A4) : 1.5 mm

 

Print Resolution :

  • Print quality black (best)
    • Up to 600 x 600 rendered dpi
  • Print quality color (best)
    • Up to 4800 x 1200 optimised dpi colour (when printing from a computer on selected HP photo papers and 1200 input dpi)

 

Print Time :

  • First page out black (A4, ready) : As fast as 17 sec
  • First page out color (A4, ready) :  As fast as 24 sec

 

Copier Specifications :

  • Colour copy capability : Yes
  • Copies, maximum : Up to 9 copies
  • Copier settings : Auto-enlarge

 

Copy Resolution :

  • Copy resolution (black text) : Up to 600 x 300 dpi
  • Copy resolution (color text and graphics) : Up to 600 x 300 dpi
  • Copy resolution (black graphics) : Up to 600 x 300 dpi

 

Copy Speed : 

  • Copy speed black (draft, A4) : Up to 4 cpm
